import React from 'react' import Heading from './Heading' import train from './images/train.webp' import { MDBFooter, MDBContainer, MDBCol, MDBRow, MDBIcon, MDBBtn } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; import train1 from './images/Sri_Lanka_Railway_logo.png' import './style.css'; export default function About() { return ( <>

Sri Lankan Railway Department

Welcome to the Sri Lankan Railway Department! Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nulla rhoncus justo et placerat ullamcorper. Vestibulum malesuada metus nec sem congue efficitur. Nulla aliquam tincidunt volutpat. Phasellus at nisi id turpis mollis volutpat.

Whether you're commuting for work or traveling for leisure, we offer convenient and reliable train services across Sri Lanka. Our extensive railway network connects major cities, towns, and scenic destinations, providing passengers with an unforgettable journey through the island's diverse landscapes.

  • Fast ticket sales: Purchase your train tickets quickly and easily through our user-friendly online booking system or at any of our ticket counters located at railway stations.
  • Multiple payment options: We accept various payment methods, including credit/debit cards, mobile wallets, and cash, to ensure flexibility and convenience for our passengers.
  • Unparalleled service at modest rates: Experience exceptional customer service from our dedicated staff members who are committed to ensuring your comfort and safety throughout your journey. Despite offering top-notch services, we strive to maintain modest ticket prices to make train travel accessible to all.
  • Scenic routes and cultural experiences: Immerse yourself in the beauty of Sri Lanka as you travel through lush greenery, picturesque villages, and historic landmarks. Our train routes offer unparalleled views of the island's natural wonders, providing passengers with a unique opportunity to explore its rich cultural heritage.
  • Special accommodations and facilities: We cater to passengers of all ages and abilities by offering special accommodations, such as wheelchair-accessible coaches and designated seating areas. Additionally, our trains are equipped with modern amenities, including air conditioning, onboard refreshments, and restroom facilities, to ensure a comfortable journey for everyone.
© 2020 Copyright: Sri Lanka Railway Department.com
) }
